bilingual.source: In the USA Martin Luther King was a leader in the Black American struggle for justice and equal rights.
bilingual.target: 在美国，马丁·路德·金是黑人争取正义和平等权利的领袖。

bilingual.source: She loves her country and said, “My message for Iranians is for love, friendship, peace and justice.”
bilingual.target: 她热爱她的国家，并说：“我给伊朗人的信息是爱、友谊、和平和正义。”
我们都应该为正义而战。

bilingual.source: She possessed a keen sense of justice.

bilingual.target: 英雄们为正义抛洒热血。
他们为正义和平等而战。

bilingual.source: The court is a place to seek justice.
bilingual.target: 法庭是追求正义的地方。

bilingual.source: The judge is meting out justice fairly.
bilingual.target: 法官在公平地分配正义。

list.abstract: justice（英 [ˈdʒʌstɪs]，美 [ˈdʒʌstɪs]），英语词语。可用作名词，指正义、司法等。英语单词有social justice，译为社会公正，例句有：The farmer went to the emperor to ask for justice (公正).（农夫去找皇帝讨个公道。） justice的复数为： justices，近义词为judge、right，反义词为injustice。

《金牌律师》是一部美国法律剧情片。《金牌律师》的情节围绕洛杉矶附近的一个大牌律师事务所TNT&G展开。故事发生在洛杉矶，所以可想而知，这个阵容豪华的律师团队最擅长的就是替社交名媛和影视明星出庭抗辩。该剧每集一个案例，以犯罪现场作“coldopen ”，然后直接切入司法程序，在律师团队的带领下完成从投案到判决的全过程。直到一集即将结束时，才快速闪回案件的真相 ——可能与庭审判决吻合，也可能截然相反。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny, there's no I In Justice League.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮，正义联盟里没有"小我"之说。

yingyinNormal.en: We are gathered to witness a historic moment of justice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们聚集在此是为了见证历史上正义的一刻。

yingyinNormal.en: Our love of country. Our commitment to justice and equality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对国家的热爱我们对正义和公平的承诺。

yingyinNormal.en: Once you bring in your verdict, let me know and justice will be done. Justice? What will you do with them? Early release.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等你作出判决，通知我一声。正义会得到伸张。正义？你要对他们做什么？提前释放。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to understand what justice is. That's a big one. I know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想理解正义。这可不简单，我知道。

yingyinNormal.en: And here is my Justice League membership card. But that doesn't prove I know Batman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我正义联盟的会员卡，但是这不能证明我认识蝙蝠侠。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm saying you put too much importance on material objects and not enough on justice. Oh, really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你把这些身外之物看得太重要，反而忽略了正义。是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, crazy for justice! And just because you're dressed like a villain doesn't mean you have to act like one!
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，为正义疯狂！你穿得像个恶棍不见得就要表现得像个恶棍！

yingyinNormal.en: Don't forget, she has a national profile after the Walker investigation. Truth and justice personified.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别忘了在沃克案调查后，她在全国也有点名气了，真理和正义的化身。

yingyinNormal.en: So are you guys coming to my New Year's Eve costume party? Of course. We're coming as the Justice League of America.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们几位来不来我的新年化装派对啊？当然来啊，我们要组成美国正义联盟。

yingyinNormal.en: Vengeance has consumed you. It's consuming them. I am done letting it consume me. Justice will come soon enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 复仇已经吞噬了你，也吞噬了他们，我不会让自己也被吞噬，正义很快就会到来。

yingyinNormal.en: Those are the robes of the Jedi, the guardians of peace and justice in the galaxy. And they don't wear underwear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是绝地武士的袍子，是银河系和平与正义的守护者呢。他们，他们都不穿小内内。

yingyinNormal.en: Justice, for my soldiers who died on a mission you devised. If anyone is to blame for their deaths, it's you. Goodbye, Viktor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正义，我的士兵在你发起的行动中丧生了。他们死了只能怪你。再见，维克多。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, please, we all know I'm the friend you call when you have no other options. If we were the Justice League, I'd be Aquaman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 少来了。大家都清楚你没有人了，才会来找我。如果我们是正义联盟，我就是海王子。

yingyinNormal.en: There's our justice, the kind men create. We base it on things like the Ten Commandments. But those can be read a million different ways.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的正义是先辈创造的以《十诫》之类的戒律为基础，但文字总有不同的解读方法。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I call dibs on the golden age flash. Hang on. I need that to complete my justice society of America collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有权要求那"Golden Age Flash"(一部漫画)。等等，我要靠它来集全"正义联盟"(一部漫画)。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't need to reimburse me because I'm not paying. On Thursday, I will have my day in court and justice will be done. In fact, I'm going to begin preparing my defense right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用你还，因为我不会交的。周四那天，我会去法院，正义会得到伸张，我现在就着手准备辩护。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, one who was drummed off the force because he refused to play by the rules, and now he hires himself out to impose his own brand of rough justice? No. Thank you, officer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是那种因为拒绝墨守陈规而被开除的警察，现在致力于用自己的残酷方式伸张正义。没有。多谢了，警官。

yingyinNormal.en: We are stopping a gross miscarriage of justice!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想要阻止这次恶心的非公正的审判!

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm actually at the justice institute now. So rewarding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我进了司法部门，特别好。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 公平; 公正; 合理
审判; 司法; 法律制裁

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 司法部；司法厅；司法部门
社会公正；社会公义；社会公平

examination_example.sentence: According to <highlight>Justice</highlight> Anthony Kennedy, the physical presence rule has harmed fair market competition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大法官安东尼·肯尼迪看来，实体存在选项出处规则损害了公平的市场竞争。

examination_example.sentence: "The basic compact underlying representative government," wrote Chief <highlight>Justice</highlight> John Roberts for the court,"assumes that public officials will hear from their constituents. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法院的首席法官John Roberts写道，“代议制政府的基本协定认为，公务员应该听从其选民的意见。”

examination_example.sentence: Every <highlight>Justice</highlight> rightly rejected this remarkable claim.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每位大法官都反对这种异乎寻常的主张。

sense_info_list.zh: 公平; 公正; 合理

examination_example.sentence: Everyone should try hard to promote social <highlight>justice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都应该努力促进社会正义。

examination_example.sentence: Words degraded to the margin have been <highlight>justice</highlight>, fairness, tolerance, proportionality and accountability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公平、公正、宽容、相称、应负责任这类字眼已被边缘化。

examination_example.sentence: In The Prince, he championed cunning, ruthlessness, and boldness, rather than virtue, mercy and <highlight>justice</highlight>, as the skills of successful leaders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在《君主论》中，他认为狡猾、残忍、富有冒险精神——而不是美德、怜悯与公平公正之心——才是一位成功领袖应有的能力。

sense_info_list.zh: 审判; 司法; 法律制裁

examination_example.sentence: That means more battles like the one now going on between the <highlight>Justice</highlight> Department and California.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着更多的像现在司法部和加利福尼亚之间正在进行的一样的战斗。

examination_example.sentence: In October the Department of <highlight>Justice</highlight> filed a brief in the Myriad case.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 10月份，司法部针对米里亚德案提交了一份陈辩书。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: the quality of being fair and reasonable

examination_example.sentence: This discrepancy between state and private education is a matter of social <highlight>justice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公立教育和私立教育之间的这种差异事关社会公正。

examination_example.sentence: The details (of the Paris agreement) on addressing "climate <highlight>justice</highlight>" can be best described as sketchy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《巴黎协定》在解决“气候公平性”问题上的细节可以说是粗略无比。

sense_info_list.en: the administration of the law or authority in maintaining this

sense_info_list.en: the quality of being fair and reasonable

examination_example.sentence: In this case, the Mothering <highlight>Justice</highlight> activist happened to be married.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这种情况下，“母亲正义”活动家也是已婚人士。

examination_example.sentence: Mothering <highlight>Justice</highlight> went last year to the state capital in Lansing, Michigan, to lobby on issues that affect working mothers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “母亲正义”组织去年前往密歇根州首府兰辛，就影响职业母亲的问题进行游说。

examination_example.sentence: One of the Mothering <highlight>Justice</highlight> organizers went to the office of a state representative to talk about the lack of affordable childcare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “母亲正义”的一名组织者去了一名州代表的办公室，讨论缺乏负担得起的儿童保育服务的问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 公正; 公平; 公道; 合理

examination_example.sentence: The farmer went to the emperor to ask for <highlight>justice</highlight> (公正).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农夫去找皇帝讨个公道。

examination_example.sentence: He said Snow was always “staying truthful and objective (客观的) and standing by <highlight>justice</highlight> (正义) and conscience (良心) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，斯诺一直“保持真实和客观，坚持正义和良知”。

sample.mean: v. 调整；整理；理算；评估；调节；适应；习惯
n. 正当的理由；辩护；辩解
v. 说明或证明正确或合理；称义；使有义；排列整齐；有充分理由
n. 玩忽职守；失职；渎职；徇私舞弊
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
n. 生手；新手；初学者；见习修士；新皈依的教徒；见习马；与“见习马”情况相似的其他动物
n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "行为, 状态"
